org.apache.river.test.share

Class FailingOwner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.share.LeaseOwner
      • org.apache.river.test.share.FailingOwner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FailingOpCountingOwner

    public class FailingOwner
extends LeaseOwner
    Owner implementation that throws a designated throwable after a given number of renewals

        protected static Logger logger

    • Constructor Detail

      • FailingOwner

        public FailingOwner(Throwable toThrow,
                    int renewsUntilError,
                    long maxExtension)
        Simple constructor
        Parameters:
        toThrow - Exception to throw after renewsUntilError renews
        renewsUntilError - Number of renews to wait for before throwing exceptions
        maxExtension - Maximum time this owner will be willing to extend the lease

      • FailingOwner

        public FailingOwner(Throwable[] toThrow,
                    int renewsUntilError,
                    long maxExtension)
        Constructor allowing an array of different types of Throwables. Each Throwable is used in order. If the end of the array is reached, the index is reset to the beginning.
        Parameters:
        toThrow - Array of Exceptions to throw after renewsUntilError renews
        renewsUntilError - Number of renews to wait for before throwing exceptions
        maxExtension - Maximum time this owner will be willing to extend the lease

    • Method Detail

      • renew

        public Object renew(long extension)
             throws net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException,
                    net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        Description copied from class: LeaseOwner
        The renewal service is renewing the given lease.

        Specified by:
        renew in class LeaseOwner
        Parameters:
        extension - The requested extension for the lease.
        Returns:
        Ether a Long representing the new duration for the lease it can simulate a RemoteException, Error, or RuntimeException by returning an object of one of these types
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException - if it wants to
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException - if it wants to

      • batchRenew

        public long batchRenew(long extension)
                throws net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException,
                       net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException
        Description copied from class: LeaseOwner
        The renewal service is renewing the lease through a lease map.
        Specified by:
        batchRenew in class LeaseOwner
        Parameters:
        extension - The requested extension for the lease.
        Returns:
        The new duration for the lease. Note owner can not directly simulate a runtime/remote exception and/or error using this method.
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.lease.UnknownLeaseException
        net.jini.core.lease.LeaseDeniedException

      • getLastThrowable

        public Throwable getLastThrowable()
        Return the last throwable thrown by this owner.
        Returns:
        the instance of the last throwable thrown by this owner or null if none has yet been thrown.
